free_text.Learning outcomes: To familiarize the student with different technologies, and economic and environmental problems of recycling of materials and the disposal of waste in relation with sustainable development.[br/]
free_text.Content: [li]	Waste and possibilities for recuperation[br/][li]	Principles of recycling[br/][li]	Recycling of metals[br/][li]	Recycling of building materials[br/][li]	Recycling of polymers and composites[br/][li]	Incineration and energy recovery[br/][li]	Toxic wastes[br/][li]	Recycling of paper and glass[br/][li]	New products out of waste[br/][li]	Life Cycle Assessment of recycling[br/]
free_text.Type of teaching: Seminars and discussions, visits of companies and recycling sites
free_text.Form of examination: The examination is in the form of a group project, which is evaluated with[br/]a "1 slide" oral presentation in the class and a written report. The final[br/]grade is the average of the following 5 grades :[br/]1. Quality of the report (English only; spelling, quality of the figures)[br/]2. Bibliography (relevance of the information; all sources MUST be cited!)[br/]3. Case study (data quality and novelty)[br/]4. Synthesis and conclusions of the project[br/]5. Quality of the 1-slide presentation (clarity, content and timing)[br/][br/]

La[br/]note finale est la moyenne des 5 notes suivantes :[br/]1. Qualité du rapport (anglais seulement ; orthographe, qualité des[br/]figures, etc)[br/]2. Bibliographie (pertinence des informations ; toutes les sources[br/]DOIVENT être citées !)[br/]3. Etude de cas (qualité des données, originalité)[br/]4. Synthèse et conclusions du projet[br/]5. Qualité de la présentation orale (clarté, contenu et ponctualité)
free_text.Objectifs d'apprentissage: Connaître les processus de recyclage des matériaux et les principes de gestion des déchets, ainsi que leurs aspects techniques, économiques et environnementaux, en relation avec le développement durable.
